definitions.definition: time when you are not working or studying; free time

examples.text: These days we have more money and more leisure to enjoy it.
Make the most of your **leisure time**!

definitions.definition: activities that you enjoy in your free time

examples.text: These days we have increased opportunities for leisure.
the leisure industry *(= the business of providing leisure activities)*
Spend the afternoon at leisure in the town centre.
Let's have lunch so we can talk at leisure.

definitions.definition: when you have the time to do something without hurrying

examples.text: I suggest you take the forms away and read them at your leisure.

definitions.definition: a man/woman who does not have to work

wordOrigin: Middle English: from Old French leisir, based on Latin licere ‘be allowed’.
